message.msgid: User name or password is incorrect!
message.msgstr: 您输入的用户名或密码错误！

message.msgid: Copyright (c) 2014 by SHENZHEN HAIWD TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD. All rights reserved.
message.msgstr: Copyright (c) 2014 深圳市海网达科技有限公司版权所有，保留一切权利。

message.msgid: The web utility requires IE 6.0 or a higher browser!
message.msgstr: 请使用IE6版本以上浏览器进行设置!

message.msgid: Upgrading... Please do NOT disconnect power connection!
message.msgstr: 设备正在升级，请勿关闭电源...

message.msgid: Restoring to factory default settings... Please wait!
message.msgstr: 设备正在恢复出厂设置，请稍候...

message.msgid: Please enter a valid MAC address!
MAC address is error! Please enter a valid MAC address!
message.msgstr: MAC地址错误，请输入正确的MAC地址！

message.msgid: The MAC address entered is a multicast address! Please retry!
message.msgstr: MAC地址为组播地址,请重新输入！
字符串中含有非法字符

message.msgid: Description must only include numbers, letters or underscore!
message.msgstr: 注释只能由数字、字母、下划线组成

message.msgid: Device Name: Displays the device name.
message.msgstr: AP设备名称：方便您在使用统一管理软件管理多个AP时能很容易地区分开来。您可以在LAN口设置中修改AP设备名称。

message.msgid: System Time: Displays the current system time.
message.msgstr: 系统时间：本设备当前使用的时间。只要一联网，系统时间即会与网络时间同步。

message.msgid: Up Time: Displays the device's uptime.
message.msgstr: 运行时间：本设备自开机到当前时刻所经历的时间。

message.msgid: Number of Wireless Clients: This section displays the information of wireless connected clients.
message.msgstr: 无线客户端个数：连接上本设备的无线客户端的个数。

message.msgid: Firmware Version: Displays the device's current firmware version.
message.msgstr: 软件版本号：本设备的当前软件版本，在升级软件时方便用户区分。

message.msgid: Hardware Version: Displays the device's hardware version.
message.msgstr: 硬件版本号：本设备的硬件版本号。

message.msgid: Primary DNS Server: Show the necessary DNS address provided by your ISP.
message.msgstr: 主DNS服务器：显示本设备的主DNS服务器

message.msgid: Secondary DNS Server: Show the other DNS address if your ISP offers you two DNS addresses.
message.msgstr: 备用DNS服务器：显示本设备的备用DNS服务器

message.msgid: MAC Address: Displays the current AP's LAN MAC address.
message.msgstr: MAC地址：LAN口的有线MAC地址。如果您用网线与设备相连接，这个MAC地址就可以通过网线与其他网络进行通信。

message.msgid: IP Address: Displays the current AP's IP address.
message.msgstr: IP地址：设备的管理IP地址。如果您要对本设备进行配置，那么您需要用这个IP地址登录设备的管理界面。您可以在LAN口设置中修改IP地址。

message.msgid: Subnet Mask: Displays the current AP's subnet mask. The default is 255.255.255.0.
message.msgstr: 子网掩码：从子网掩码可以看出与设备在同一网段的主机个数。子网掩码默认为255.255.255.0，前面3个255不是主机位，只有最后一位才能用来设置主机，最大可设置254个，设备本身占用了一个，所以还可以设置253个。即您可以将自己的IP设置为192.168.0.X，X的范围是1~253，这样才可以访问本设备的管理界面。

message.msgid: Radio ON/OFF: Displays the primary SSID's wireless status.
message.msgstr: 射频开关：显示设备主SSID的无线是否己开启。可以无线设置-基本设置中修改。

message.msgid: Network Mode: Displays currently operative network mode. We recommend you select 11b/g/n mixed mode.
message.msgstr: 网络模式：显示设备所用的网络模式。可以在无线设置-射频设置中修改。建议选用11b/g/n混合模式，这样无线速率最高。

message.msgid: Channel: Displays the channel the device is currently operating on.
message.msgstr: 信道：设备当前的无线发射信号使用的信道。可以在无线设置-射频设置中修改。信道尽量选用与相邻AP相隔最大的信道，这样干扰最小。

message.msgid: SSID: Displays the current SSIDs of the wireless network.
message.msgstr: SSID：显示设备当前的SSID名称。可以在无线设置-基本设置中修改。

message.msgid: MAC Address: Displays the current AP's MAC addresses.
message.msgstr: MAC地址：显示设备的SSID的MAC地址，即每个SSID与其他网络通信必须要用到的地址。

message.msgid: Enabling Status: Displays SSID's enabling status.
message.msgstr: 启用状态：显示设备每个SSID的开启状态。己启用表示此SSID可以发射无线信号，无线客户端可以搜索到此SSID。未启用表示此SSID不能发射无线信号，也就搜索不到此SSID了。可以在无线设置-基本设置中修改SSID的启用状态。
加密方式：显示每个SSID的安全模式。可以在无线设置-基本设置中修改。

message.msgid: MAC Address: Displays the remote AP's MAC address.
message.msgstr: MAC地址：显示对端AP的MAC地址。做WDS功能时，需要2个或多个AP之前相互填写对方的MAC地址。

message.msgid: Connection Status: Displays the device's connection status.
message.msgstr: 连接状态：WDS的连接状态。未连接表示设备没有成功连接到对端AP上面。己连接表示设备已经单方向地连接上了对端AP。

message.msgid: Note: When WDS is disabled, this status won't be displayed.
message.msgstr: 注意：当未启用WDS时，不会显示该状态。

message.msgid: SSID: Displays current SSID of the wireless network.
Total RX Traffic: Total RX bytes SSID has received.
message.msgstr: 总接收流量：SSID接收到的总的字节数。

message.msgid: Total RX Packets: Total RX packets SSID has received.
message.msgstr: 总接收数据包：SSID接收到总的数据包的个数。

message.msgid: Total TX Traffic: Total TX bytes SSID has transmitted.
message.msgstr: 总发送流量：SSID向外发送的总的字节数。

message.msgid: Total TX Packets: Total TX packets SSID has transmitted.
message.msgstr: 总发送数据包：SSID向外发送的总的数据包的个数。

message.msgid: Select the SSID you wish to check and its wireless client information will appear.
message.msgstr: 选择您要查看的SSID，就会显示此SSID下无线客户端的信息。

message.msgid: MAC Address : Displays wireless client's MAC address.
message.msgstr: MAC地址：无线客户端的MAC地址。

message.msgid: IP Address : Displays wireless client's IP address.
message.msgstr: IP地址：无线客户端的IP地址。

message.msgid: IP: Displays wireless client's IP address. If it is not on the same subnet as that of AP, it will display unknown.
message.msgstr: IP：无线客户端获取到的IP地址。如果与本设备在不同网段，会显示未知。

message.msgid: Connection Time: Displays connection duration SSID has connected to.
message.msgstr: 连接时间：显示无线客户端连接上此SSID的时间。

message.msgid: Send Speed: Displays the current device's send speed.
message.msgstr: 发送速率：当前客户端传输速率。

message.msgid: Receive Speed: Displays the current device's receive speed.
message.msgstr: 接收速率：当前客户端接收速率。

message.msgid: This device supports 3 working modes. You can select it as you need.
message.msgstr: 本设备共支持3种工作模式，您可以根据具体的应用选择不同的工作模式。

message.msgid: AP Mode: It can achieve the conversion between cable signals and wireless signals. If this device is connected to the broadband interface of a hotel room, you can achieve network sharing among multiple PCs without any configuration.
message.msgstr: AP模式：可以作为有线信号与无线信号的转化器，比如用网线将设备与宾馆房间内宽带接口连接，无需设置即可实现多台电脑共享无线上网。

message.msgid: WDS Mode: In this bridging mode,the primary SSID and channel will be the same as that of the remote AP automatically. And so will the security mode and key.
message.msgstr: WDS模式：网桥模式，主SSID、信道将自动设置成和对端AP的一样，同时，加密方式和密钥也要与对端一致。

message.msgid: Client AP: The primary SSID and channel will be the same as that of the uplinked AP automatically. So will the security mode and key
message.msgstr: Client+AP：主SSID、信道将自动设置成和上级AP的一样，同时加密方式与密钥也需一致。

message.msgid: The secondary SSID (wireless network) now works as a wireless Access Point, providing access to wireless clients. In this mode, the DHCP server is disabled automatically.
message.msgstr: 此时次SSID为无线AP模式，提供无线客户端连接。使用此模式时，DHCP服务器将被关闭。

message.msgid: In this mode, this device can be connected to wireless clients, but cannot connect other APs actively.
message.msgstr: 在AP模式下，本设备可以接受无线客户端的连接，但不能去连接其他AP。

message.msgid: SSID: Displays the primary SSID's name.
Security Mode: Displays primary SSID's security mode.
message.msgstr: 安全模式：设置主SSID的安全模式，选择安全模式后，可设置主SSID的无线密码。

message.msgid: In this mode, this device can provide access to at most 4 APs.
message.msgstr: 在WDS模式下，本设备可与最多4个AP进行连接。

message.msgid: SSID: The default is this device's primary SSID. Once WDS is enabled, the primary SSID will be modified to the first remote AP's SSID.
message.msgstr: SSID：默认显示为本设备的主SSID。一旦开始做WDS功能，主SSID会自动修改为对端第一个AP的SSID。

message.msgid: Security Mode: You can configure primary SSID's security mode and it should be kept the same as that of the remote AP.
message.msgstr: 安全模式：设置主SSID的加密方式，必须与对端AP的加密方式完全一样。

message.msgid: MAC Address: You can enter the remote MAC address manually or open scan to add it automatically.
message.msgstr: MAC地址：可以手动填写对端MAC，也可以通过扫描，自动添加对端的MAC地址。

message.msgid: Channel: When WDS is enabled, please keep all APs on the same channel.
message.msgstr: 上级AP的信道：做WDS功能时，应保证所有AP在同一信道。

message.msgid: Unknown: The default status is unknown.
message.msgstr: 未知：默认状态，当未开始做WDS功能时，状态为未知。

message.msgid: Connected: %s has connected to the remote AP successfully. But in WDS mode,the remote AP also needs to connect to %s at the same time.
message.msgstr: 己连接：表示%s单方向地连接到了对端AP上。对端AP也要成功连接上%s，WDS才算做成功了。

message.msgid: Disconnected: %s hasn't connected to the remote AP.
message.msgstr: 未连接：表示%s没有成功连接上对端AP。

message.msgid: Enable Scan: Scans wireless signals nearby.
message.msgstr: 开启扫描：扫描周围无线信号，便于自动添加对端AP的信息。

message.msgid: In WDS mode,the two APs should support WDS and you should keep their SSIDs, channels, security modes and keys the same. As for IP address, they should not be the same but on the same network segment;
message.msgstr: WDS功能需要两台AP均支持此功能，而且SSID、信道、加密方式和密码必须与对端AP的相同，IP地址在同一网段但要设置为不同IP；

message.msgid: 2. Once the security mode has been changed, please reboot the device.
message.msgstr: 2、 如果改变加密方式，请重启本设备。

message.msgid: In this mode, %s negotiates with the uplinked AP successfully and also provides access to lower clients. %s's SSID won't be changed.
message.msgstr: 在APClient模式下，%s与上级AP协商成功，同时接受下级客户端的无线连接。下级客户端连接上%s且上级AP有DHCP服务器时，可以从上级AP获取IP地址。此模式下，不会改变%s的SSID。

message.msgid: SSID: You can configure the uplinked AP's SSID name here.
Security Mode: You can configure the uplinked AP's security mode here.
message.msgstr: 安全模式：设置上级AP的安全模式等。

message.msgid: MAC Address: You can configure the uplinked AP's MAC address here.
message.msgstr: 上级AP的MAC地址：设置上级AP的MAC地址。

message.msgid: Channel: You can configure the uplinked AP's channel here.
message.msgstr: 上级AP的信道：设置上级AP的信道。

message.msgid: Here you can configure the LAN IP address.
IP Address: The AP's LAN IP address. The default is 192.168.0.254.
message.msgstr: IP地址：本AP的局域网IP地址。出厂值默认为192.168.0.254，您可以根据需要改变它。

message.msgid: Subnet Mask: The AP's LAN subnet mask.
message.msgstr: 子网掩码：本AP对局域网的子网掩码。

message.msgid: Gateway: Enter the IP address of the uplinked router.
message.msgstr: 网关地址：设置为上级路由器的网关。

message.msgid: If you change this IP address, you must use the new one to re-log on to this web utility.
message.msgstr: 如果您修改了该IP地址，您必须用修改后的IP地址才能登录AP的WEB界面进行管理，

message.msgid: If necessary please press the Reset button to restore factory settings.
message.msgstr: 紧急时，请使用设备上的复位按钮进行复位。

message.msgid: DHCP Server: Select whether to enable or disable the DHCP server feature.
message.msgstr: DHCP服务器：如果您想使用DHCP的自动分配IP功能，请勾选该选项。

message.msgid: Start IP: Enter the starting IP address for the DHCP server's IP assignment.
message.msgstr: IP池开始地址： DHCP服务器所自动分配的IP的起始地址。

message.msgid: End IP: Enter the ending IP address for the DHCP server's IP assignment.
message.msgstr: IP池结束地址： DHCP服务器所自动分配的IP的结束地址。

message.msgid: Lease Time: The length of time for the IP address lease.
message.msgstr: 租约时间： DHCP服务器分配的IP地址租期。

message.msgid: Primary DNS Server: Enter the necessary DNS address provided by your ISP (This field cannot be blank). Consult your ISP if you are not clear.
message.msgstr: 主DNS服务器： 必选项，填入ISP提供给您的DNS服务器，不清楚可以向ISP询问。

message.msgid: Secondary DNS Server: Enter the other DNS address if your ISP offers you two DNS addresses (This field is optional).
message.msgstr: 备用DNS服务器： 可选项，如果ISP提供给您了两个DNS服务器，则您可以把另一个DNS服务器的IP地址填于此处。

message.msgid: To apply the DHCP server settings to all your LAN PCs, you must set all PCs to 'Obtain an IP address automatically' and 'Obtain DNS server address automatically' respectively.
message.msgstr: 为了使用本路由器的DHCP服务器功能，局域网中各计算机的IP地址必须设置为‘自动获得IP地址’

message.msgid: In this section you can configure the basic wireless settings of the device such as the SSID (name of the network) and broadcast channel.
message.msgstr: 此页面主要对无线基本信息进行设置，建议只设置SSID和加密，其他选项保持默认。

message.msgid: Enable: Select it to enable this SSID.
message.msgstr: 启用：勾选该选项则启用该SSID。

message.msgid: Hide SSID automatically: If you select this item, and when number of clients reach to the maximum, this SSID will be hidden automatically.If you select this item,SSID Broadcast can't be selected.
message.msgstr: 自动隐藏SSID：勾选该选项则在客户端数量达到最大值时自动隐藏该SSID。若选择自动隐藏则广播SSID不能配置。

message.msgid: SSID Broadcast: This option allows you to have your network name (SSID) publicly broadcast or if you choose to disable it, the SSID will be hidden.
message.msgstr: 广播SSID：无线客户端在本地区域扫描要关联的无线网络时，可以检测到SSID广播。 如果选中，AP将向所有的无线主机广播自己的SSID。

message.msgid: AP Isolation: Isolates clients connecting to the same SSID.
message.msgstr: 客户端隔离：选择开启客户端隔离，则将同一SSID下的无线客户端之间相互隔离。

message.msgid: SSID Isolation: Isolates clients connecting to different SSIDs.
message.msgstr: SSID隔离：选择开启SSID隔离，则将不同SSID下的无线客户端之间相互隔离。

message.msgid: Maximum Clients: Total clients should be within 128.
message.msgstr: 最大客户端数量：已开启的SSID最大客户端数量，总和不能超过128。

message.msgid: SSID: This is the public name of your wireless network. Select the SSID you wish to configure from the drop-down list.
message.msgstr: SSID：无线网络中所有设备共享的网络名称，可从下拉列表中选择某一SSID进行相应设置。

message.msgid: Chinese SSID Encode: To support Chinese SSID according to the wireless client supports codeing format selection UFT-8/GB2312 code, the default is UTF-8.
message.msgstr: 中文SSID编码格式：可以根据您的无线客户端支持的编码格式选择UTF-8/GB2312编码来支持中文SSID显示，默认为UTF-8。

message.msgid: Security Mode: Select WEP, WPA-PSK or WPA2-PSK.
message.msgstr: 安全模式：可以选择不加密，WEP，WPA/WPA2个人和WPA/WPA2企业模式；

message.msgid: (1).WEP: compliance with the full IEEE 802.11 standard.

message.msgstr: 认证类型：Open（使用开放系统方式），Shared（使用共享密钥方式），802.1x（使用Radius服务器进行身份认证）；

message.msgid: Enter a WEP key that is either 5~13 ASCI characters or 10~26 Hex characters when your encryption type is Open and Shared.
message.msgstr: 其中Open和Shared可以输入5或13个有效ASCII码，或者输入10或26个有效Hex码（16进制数，只能含0-9,a-f,A-F），可同时设置4个密钥，只有选择的默认密钥有效；802.1x需输入服务器地址，端口号，1-64位ASCII码密钥。

message.msgid: (2).WPA/WPA2-Personal: A mode based on WPA/WPA2-PSK .You can enable personal (PSK) or mixed mode, but you must make sure that the wireless client also supports the selected encryption method.
message.msgstr:
(2).WPA/WPA2个人模式：基于共享密钥的WPA或WPA2模式。
可分为WPA-PSK，WPA2-PSK和Mixed WPA/WPA2-PSK加密，可以使用个人或混合模式。

message.msgid: Cipher Type: Select AES, TKIP and TKIP&AES;
Key: Enter a security key that is either 8-63 ASCII characters or 8-64 Hex characters.
message.msgstr: 密钥：允许输入8-63个有效ASCII码或64个Hex码；

message.msgid: Key Update Interval: You can configure security key's upgrade cycle here(60—99999 seconds).
message.msgstr: 密钥更新周期：范围在60-99999秒间。

message.msgid: (3).WPA/WPA2-Enterprise : A mode based on Radius server authentication.
message.msgstr: (3).WPA/WPA2企业模式：基于Radius服务器进行身份认证并得到密钥的WPA或WPA2模式。

message.msgid: Radius Server: Displays the Radius server's IP address.
message.msgstr: Radius服务器：进行身份认证的Radius服务器的IP地址；

message.msgid: Radius Port: Authentication port for Radius server. The default is 1812.
message.msgstr: Radius端口：Radius服务器使用的认证端口，默认值为1812；

message.msgid: Radius Key: Enter a key that is 1-64 ASCI characters.
message.msgstr: Radius密钥：允许输入1-64个有效ASCII码；
密钥更新周期：范围在60-99999秒间。

message.msgid: When your security mode is WEP or WPA/WPA2, please be sure your wireless client supports it.
message.msgstr: 选择WEP或WPA/WPA2加密时必须确定您的无线客户端支持该加密方式。

message.msgid: Here you can configure basic wireless settings including network mode, channel, extension channel, channel bandwidth and etc.
message.msgstr: 此页面主要对无线主接口的参数进行设置。

message.msgid: Network Mode: Select a proper network mode: 11 b/g/n mixed, 11 b/g mixed, 11g or 11b.
message.msgstr: 网络模式：可以选择11b/g混合模式，11b模式，11g模式或11b/g/n混合模式。

message.msgid: Channel: For an optimal wireless performance, you may select the least interferential channel. It is advisable that you select 'Auto' to let the device detect and select the best possible channel for your wireless network to operate on.
message.msgstr: 信道：您可以选择下拉列表中任何一个信道或者是自动模式，尽可能选择当前区域使用比较少的信道以避免干扰。

message.msgid: Extension Channel: This is used to ensure N speeds for 802.11n devices on the network (2.4GHz).
message.msgstr: 扩展信道：在2.4GHz网络，用于确定11n模式时本网络工作的频率段。

message.msgid: Channel Lockout: You can configure channel lockout, channel bandwidth and channel extension here. In AP Client and WDS mode, just keep the default configuration and the channel will be kept the same as that of the uplinked device automatically.
message.msgstr: 锁定信道：可以锁定信道，信道带宽与扩展信道的设置。其中AP client和WDS模式下不可修改保持默认即可，信道设置会自动保持与上一级设备参数相同

message.msgid: Key Update Interval: You can configure security key's upgrade cycle here.60—99999 seconds. If set to 0, key will not be updated.
message.msgstr: 密钥更新周期：设置加密有效周期，范围：60—99999，0代表不更新。

message.msgid: You can open scan to scan current wireless signals.
message.msgstr: 扫描当前区域中存在的无线网络工作的信道。

message.msgid: WDS Mode: If you select WDS Repeater mode, you can enable scan to automatically add the MAC address of the selected remote device to the AP MAC address field and then manually set the primary SSID, mode, channel, security mode and security key of your AP to match the remote AP.For better compatibility with the remote AP, WEP encryption is recommended.
message.msgstr: WDS模式：选择WDS Repeater模式时，通过扫描选择把对端MAC自动添加到AP MAC地址栏中，还需手动将主SSID，模式与信道，加密方式与密码修改成对端AP一致，建议使用WEP加密方式，可以提高和对端AP的兼容性。

message.msgid: This section allows you to configure advanced wireless settings. if you are new to networking and have never configured these settings before, we recommend you to leave the default settings unchanged.
message.msgstr: 使用无线高级设置可以详细地设置无线功能，包含了无线基本设置之外的设置项，在您不了解这些设置规则时请保留默认设置。

message.msgid: Beacon Interval: This is a time interval between any two consecutive Beacon packets sent by an Access Point to synchronize a wireless network. Specify a valid value between 20 and 999. The default setting is 100.
message.msgstr: Beacon间隔：其取值范围是20-999，默认值是100，设置可以帮助你提高无线客户端的性能，Beacon间隔就是无线AP隔多久发送一个Beacon帧。无线网卡都在ISM频道内一直持续扫描，等到扫到无线AP的Beacon时，就会在无线网络连接中显示这个无线AP；

message.msgid: Fragment Threshold: Specify a valid Fragment Threshold value between 255 and 2346. The default is 2346. Any wireless packet exceeding the preset value will be divided into several fragments before transmission.
message.msgstr: Fragment阀值：其取值范围是256-2346，默认值2346，设置的是最大包长度，如果数据超过这个长度，就必须被分包传输；

message.msgid: RTS Threshold: Specify a valid value between 1 and 2347. The default is 2347. If a packet exceeds the preset value, RTS/CTS scheme will be used to reduce collisions. A smaller value is recommended if you have distant clients or interference on your network.
message.msgstr: RTS门限：其取值范围是1-2347，默认值是2347，RTS（Request To Send），当数据包的大小超过这个阈值时，使用RTS/CTS机制，降低发生冲突的可能性。在存在干扰长距离客户端接入情况下，可以设置相对较小的RTS值；

message.msgid: DTIM Interval: A DTIM (Delivery Traffic Indication Message) Interval is a countdown informing clients of the next window for listening to broadcast and multicast messages. When such packets arrive in the router's buffer, the router will send DTIM (delivery traffic indication message) and DTIM interval to alert clients of the receiving packets. Specify a valid value between 1-255. The default is 1.
message.msgstr: DTIM间隔：这个值表示delivery traffic indication message(DTIM)间隔，取值范围是1—255，默认值是1。DTIM栏是一个倒数栏，用于通知客户端下一个监听广播和多播信息的窗口。当AP缓冲了发送到客户端的广播或多播信息，它发送下一个DTIM及DTIM间隔，唤醒客户端接收这些信息。

message.msgid: Receive Signal strength:This section allows AP to receive signal strength (in dBm) , range: (-90- -60)dBm.2.4G :the default is -80dBm,5G :the default is -90dBm.
message.msgstr: 接入信号强度：接入信号强度限制，取值范围：(-90 - -60)dBm，2.4G默认：-80dBm,5G默认：90dBm。

message.msgid: Interference mitigation: interference mitigation mode , range: 0-4. The default is 2.
message.msgstr: Interference模式：干扰抑制模式设置，取值范围：0 - 4，默认：2。

message.msgid: (2).mode 1: Non-wireless LAN Interference mitigation is enabled.
message.msgstr: （2）模式1：启用同频段干扰抑制，如微波炉、手机、蓝牙设备造成的同频干扰。

message.msgid: (3).mode 2: Wireless LAN Interference mitigation is enabled.
message.msgstr: （3）模式2：强制开启无线电干扰抑制。

message.msgid: (4).mode 3: Auto Wireless LAN Interference mitigation is enabled and active.
message.msgstr: （4）模式3：自动无线电干扰抑制模式启用。

message.msgid: (5).mode 4: Auto Wireless LAN Interference mitigation is enabled and noise reduction is enabled.
message.msgstr: （5）模式4：自动无线电干扰抑制模式启用并降低噪声。

message.msgid: TX Power: Control TX power.2.4G range: 17-23dBm. The default is 23dBm, 5G range: 17-21dBm. The default is 21dBm.
message.msgstr: TX功率：输出功率控制，2.4GHz取值范围是17 - 23dBm，默认值是23dBm，5GHz取值范围是17- 21dBm，默认值是21dBm。

message.msgid: Power Lockout: Once enabled, you can lockout this configuration.
message.msgstr: 锁定功率：锁定功率即启动情况下可锁定无线功率的设置。

message.msgid: The 8 bytes of the preamble and the Start of Frame create a pattern of 64 bits. 7 bytes of the preamble are for synchronization and 1 byte is for SFD, which basically says here comes a new frame, being a 'get ready' notification. There are two types of preambles: long preamble and short preamble. By default, the device transmits data using the long preamble.
message.msgstr: 无线前导码：前导码是数据帧头部的一组Bit位，用于同步发送端与接收端的传输信号。分长前导码与短前导码，默认情况下设备选择长前导码传输数据，为了提高网络传输效率，可以使用短前导码。

message.msgid: 5GHZ SSID priority: If your wireless client supports 5G WIFI,client will preferential choose 5G ssid which 2.4G and 5G ssid and security is same.
message.msgstr: 5GHZ优先：如果您的无线客户端支持双频WIFI，则当AP两个频段的SSID和密码相同时，客户端会将会优先选择5G SSID进行连接。

message.msgid: Note:5GHZ SSID priority only supports WPA/WPA2-Personal security mode.it does not support Chinese SSID.
message.msgstr: 注意：5GHZ优先仅支持WPA/WPA2个人加密，不支持中文SSID。

message.msgid: Specify a list of devices to allow or disallow a connection to your wireless network via the device's MAC addresses.
message.msgstr: 使用无线访问控制功能，可以根据PC的无线网卡MAC地址控制其是否可以与AP进行通信。

message.msgid: To deactivate this feature, select 'Disable'; to activate it, select 'Allow' or 'Deny'.
message.msgstr: 要禁用无线访问控制功能，请选关闭；要设置该功能，请选择仅允许或仅禁止。

message.msgid: When 802.1 QVLAN enabled, this device can be used with switches with VLAN function and establish multiple wireless subnets. Clients connecting to different VLAN IDs cannot access each other.
message.msgstr: 即802.1Q vlan技术，在开启该vlan功能后，AP接入器可以结合带VLAN功能的交换机一起使用，建立多个无线子网，且接入不同VLAN ID的无线工作站点将无法互相访问。

message.msgid: SSID: Displays current SSID of the wireless network.
message.msgstr: SSID：标识无线网络的名称，最大支持32个字符。

message.msgid: VLAN ID: You can configure VLAN ID here(2-4095).
message.msgstr: VLAN ID: 可配置VLAN的ID标识，范围在2-4095。

message.msgid: You can configure SSID's binding info to VLAN here. The default is 1000(2-4095).
message.msgstr: 此页面主要用于配置AP中各SSID与VLAN的绑定信息，从而可以使无线设备中所绑定的VLAN数据流间是独立的、不能互访的。默认绑定的VLAN号为1000，可绑定的VLAN范围为2-4095。

message.msgid: Here you can configure SNMP v1 & v2c that can read and write Administrator Name, Device Name, and Location.
message.msgstr: 本页设置SNMP对象属性，支持SNMP V1&V2C版本，可以对系统的三个标准MIB节点：管理员名称，设备名称和位置，进行读写设置；

message.msgid: SNMP: Enable/disable the SNMP proxy feature.
message.msgstr: SNMP设置：选择禁用/启用，将关闭/打开SNMP代理功能；

message.msgid: Read Community: Specify a community string for reading SNMP proxy information.
message.msgstr: 读 Community：设置读取SNMP代理信息的团体名；

message.msgid: Write/Read Community: Specify a community string for writing/reading SNMP proxy information.
message.msgstr: 读/写 Community：设置读/写SNMP代理信息的团体名。

message.msgid: Here you can time the AP to reboot. Time is based on 24hs/day format. When setting the time reboot feature, make sure the device's system time synchronizes with Internet time server.
message.msgstr: 您可以通过本页设置本AP的定时重启功能。其中时间是按24小时标准，如果设置了定时重启功能，请确保与设备的网络时间同步。

message.msgid: This section assists you in setting the device's current time; you can select to either set the time and date manually or obtain the GMT time from Internet automatically.
message.msgstr: 您可以通过本页设置本AP的系统时间和您所在的时区，如果启用网络校时，当系统连接互联网后会自动连接NTP服务器进行时间同步，您也可以手动输入或复制本地时间。

message.msgid: Here you can configure the web login timeout (1-60 minutes). The default is 5 minutes.
message.msgstr: 您可以通过本页设置您过多长时间需要重新输入密码登陆到AP设置页面，单位为分钟，默认值为5，范围：1～60分钟。

message.msgid: Click this button to reset the device to factory default values.
message.msgstr: 恢复出厂设置按钮将使AP的所有设置恢复到出厂时的默认状态。其中：

message.msgid: This section allows you to change your login user name and password.
message.msgstr: 本页可以修改系统的用户名和密码。普通用户只有查看权限没有修改权限。

message.msgid: Log Server IP Address: SysLog Server IP Address.
message.msgstr: 日志服务器IP地址： 安装日志服务器主机的IP地址；

message.msgid: Log Server Port: Refers to the protocol port for syslog (514 by default). You should set it the same to the host server.
message.msgstr: 日志服务器端口：日志服务的协议端口（缺省端口514），可根据日志服务器设定的端口，进行修改；它应与日志服务器保持一致；

message.msgid: Enable: Select whether to enable the log server.
message.msgstr: 启用： 选择是否启用本日志服务器。

message.msgid: This section allows you to modify LED status.
message.msgstr: 本页可修改LED灯的开启关闭状态。

message.msgid: This section displays information of connected clients (if any).
message.msgstr: 本页显示无线AP的连接信息。

message.msgid: Note: If the wireless client's IP address is not on the same subnet as that of W185AP, it will display unknown.
message.msgstr: （注，当连接的客户端设置的IP与AP LAN口IP不在同网段时，列表中IP栏数据将显示为：未知）
%d 天 %d 小时 %d 分钟 %d 秒

message.msgid: Please wait for 10 seconds to save new ip.
message.msgstr: 请稍等十几秒保存新的IP.

message.msgid: Device name can only be made up of numbers, letters, underline, dot, hyphen, or Chinese.
message.msgstr: 设备名称仅支持字母，数字，连字符（-），下划线，点号（.）和中文字符

message.msgid: The length of device name should not be greater than 32 bits.
message.msgstr: 设备名称长度不能超过32位

message.msgid: The Subnet mask must large or equal than LAN IP's Subnet mask!
message.msgstr: 子网掩码必须大于或者等于LAN子网掩码大

message.msgid: Once DHCP is enabled, client list will be refreshed automatically every five seconds.
message.msgstr: 如果您启用DHCP功能后，客户端列表每5秒会自动刷新一次。

message.msgid: You must log in as an administrator to make any change.
message.msgstr: 您没有修改权限,请以管理员用户登陆修改！

message.msgid: You have already saved the settings. No need to do it again.
Please specify a valid gateway IP address!
message.msgstr: 网关地址错误，不能为广播IP地址！

message.msgid: Please specify a valid IP address!
message.msgstr: 修改的IP地址为错误的IP地址，主机部分为0！

message.msgid: Please input a valid IP address!
message.msgstr: IP地址最后一位不能为255，请输入一个有效的IP地址！

message.msgid: The gateway IP address you entered is a broadcast IP address. Please specify a valid gateway IP address!
message.msgstr: 修改的IP地址为错误的IP地址，主机部分为1，为广播IP地址！

message.msgid: The new subnet mask is smaller than the old one, which may affect other functionalities. Are you sure you want to save the change?
message.msgstr: 修改后的子网掩码小于原来的子网掩码，可能影响其它功能的设置，确定要修改子网掩码？

message.msgid: LAN IP address should not be the same as that of gateway!
LAN IP address should be on the same subnet as gateway!
message.msgstr: LAN口IP和网关必须在同一个网段！

message.msgid: If you change this LAN IP address, you must use the new one to re-log on to this utility. Are you sure you want to continue?
message.msgstr: 更改IP地址后，您需要以新的IP重新登录！

message.msgid: The start IP and LAN IP should be in the same network segment!
message.msgstr: 开始IP应该与LAN口IP在同一网段！

message.msgid: The end IP and LAN IP should be in the same network segment!
message.msgstr: 开始结束IP应该在同一网段！

message.msgid: The start IP address you entered is a broadcast IP address. Please specify a valid start IP address!
message.msgstr: 修改的开始地址IP为错误的IP地址，主机部分为1,为广播IP地址！

message.msgid: Please specify a valid start IP address!
message.msgstr: 修改的开始地址IP为错误的IP地址，主机部分为0 ！

message.msgid: The end IP address you entered is a broadcast IP address. Please specify a valid end IP address!
message.msgstr: 修改的结束地址IP为错误的IP地址，主机部分为1,为广播IP地址！

message.msgid: Please specify a valid end IP address!
message.msgstr: 修改的结束地址IP为错误的IP地址，主机部分为0 ！

message.msgid: Please specify a valid gateway IP address!
message.msgstr: 修改的网关地址为错误的地址，主机部分为0 ！

message.msgid: The gateway IP address you entered is a broadcast IP address. Please specify a valid gateway IP address!
message.msgstr: 修改的网关地址为错误的地址，主机部分为1,为广播IP地址！

message.msgid: Please specify a valid primary DNS server address!
Please specify a valid secondary DNS server address!
Please enter a valid Device Name!
message.msgstr: 请输入一个有效的设备名称！

message.msgid: The start IP address should be smaller than the end IP address!
message.msgstr: IP池开始地址不能大于结束地址！

message.msgid: s(Range: 60—99999 seconds. If set to 0, key will not be updated.)
In WDS Mode,the frist ssid can't be changed.
message.msgstr: WDS模式不能修改第一个SSID配置

message.msgid: In Ap Clinet Mode or WDS Mode,this page can't be changed.
message.msgstr: Apclient模式和WDS模式下该页面修改无效

message.msgid: Specify a list of devices to allow or disallow a connection to your wireless network via the devices' MAC addresses. This can be set seperately on each SSID.
message.msgstr: 配置无线接口MAC地址过滤策略,分别对每个SSID设置。

message.msgid: 1. In this mode, when you open scan and save your configurations, the remote MAC address will be filled in automatically and so the SSID. For stability, please keep the mode, channel, the extension channel the same as the remote one. You can configure it in "Wireless>Radio".
2. If you want to configure the encryption, click 'Wireless>Basic' and remember to keep security mode and key the same as the remote one.
message.msgstr: 2、如果对无线进行了加密，加密方式与密钥也应与对端一致，请在“无线设置->加密方式”中设置。

message.msgid: 3. In this mode, only the primary SSID can be connected.
message.msgstr: 3、WDS默认使用主SSID进行连接，并且只能通过主SSID进行连接。

message.msgid: 2.4GHz and 5GHz own the same main ssid VLAN ID, 5GHz Qvlan main ssid VLAN ID will be change too,are you continue?
message.msgstr: 2.4GHz 和 5GHz 共用一个主SSID VLAN ID,5GHz 主SSID VLAN ID将随2.4GHz 主SSID VLAN ID改变而改变，确定继续？

message.msgid: 2.4GHz and 5GHz own the same main ssid VLAN ID, 2.4GHz Qvlan main ssid VLAN ID will be change too,are you continue?
message.msgstr: 2.4GHz 和 5GHz 共用一个主SSID VLAN ID,2.4GHz 主SSID VLAN ID将随5GHz 主SSID VLAN ID改变而改变，确定继续？

message.msgid: In WDS mode, the first SSID cannot be disabled!
message.msgstr: WDS模式下第一个SSID不能禁用，否则该功能会无法正常使用！

message.msgid: In AP Client mode, the first SSID cannot be disabled!
message.msgstr: AP Client模式下第一个SSID不能禁用，否则该功能会无法正常使用！

message.msgid: In AP Client mode, channel lockout has been enabled. No configuration is needed!
message.msgstr: AP Client模式下信道锁定已启用，不需做任何设置，否则影响正常使用！

message.msgid: In WDS mode, channel lockout has been enabled. No configuration is needed!
message.msgstr: WDS模式下信道锁定已启用，不需做任何设置，否则影响正常使用！

message.msgid: Up to 16 MAC address entries can be configured!
Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
The specified MAC address already exists!
WEP key %s is invalid! Please enter 5 or 13 ASCII characters!
message.msgstr: WEP密钥%s无效，请输入5或13个ASCII码！

message.msgid: WEP key %s is invalid! Please enter 10 or 26 Hex characters.
message.msgstr: WEP密钥%s无效，请输入10或26个Hex码！

message.msgid: Invalid WEP security key %s. %s can't be included.
Please enter valid RADIUS port number!

message.msgstr: 请输入正确的RADIUS密钥，1-64位ASCII码！

message.msgid: Please enter 8-64 Hex characters or 8-63 ASCII characters.
message.msgstr: 请输入8-64位十六进制码或8-63位ASCII码！

message.msgid: Invalid security key. %s can't be included.
Are you sure to connect to this AP?
%s is invalid %s range: %s - %s.They must be round numbers!
SSID can only include up to 32 characters!
message.msgstr: SSID不能超过32个字符(中文占3个字符)！

message.msgid: This MAC address already exists! Please enter a new one!
Total maximum clients should be within 128!
message.msgstr: 已开启的SSID最大客户端数量总和不能超过128！

message.msgid: Key Update Interval must be either 0 or 60~99999!
message.msgstr: 密钥更新周期无效,范围：60~99999。

message.msgid: QVLAN disabled or no changes, please do not save again!
message.msgstr: QVLAN未启用或修改，请勿重复保存！

message.msgid: If save the configurations, the device will reboot immediately. Are you sure to reboot?
message.msgstr: 保存设置，设备将会重启，是否重启？

message.msgid: You must allow the feature or specify a rule!
message.msgstr: 选择仅允许时必须输入或启用一条规则！

message.msgid: You must disable the feature or specify a rule!
message.msgstr: 选择仅禁止时必须输入一条规则！

message.msgid: When saved, the first SSID will be enabled and you should modify the permitted numbers of clients!
message.msgstr: 保存后第一个SSID会被启用，此时所启用的SSID最大客户端数量之和已大于128，请修改无线基本设置中SSID允许的最大客户端数量！

message.msgid: SSID can not be same with same band other SSID
message.msgstr: SSID不能与本设备同频段的其他SSID相同

message.msgid: Here you can configure SNMP settings. SNMP v1 and v2c are supported.
message.msgstr: 本页设置SNMP对象属性,支持SNMP V1& V2C版本。

message.msgid: Read Community should not be the same as that of Write/Read Community!
message.msgstr: 读 Community 不能和读/写 Community 相同

message.msgid: Use this section to update device's firmware for better functionalities or new features.
message.msgstr: 通过升级本AP的软件，您将获得新的功能。

message.msgid: Note: DO NOT disconnect the device from power and network connections while upgrade is in process, otherwise it may be permanently damaged. When upgrade is complete, the device restarts automatically. Upgrade may take about 90 seconds. Please wait.
message.msgstr: 注意：升级过程不能关闭AP电源，否则将导致AP损坏而无法使用。升级成功后，AP将自动重启。升级过程约90秒左右，请等候。

message.msgid: Device is upgrading,this may take about 90 seconds. Please wait...
message.msgstr: 设备正在升级，升级需持续两分钟左右，升级完成后页面会自动跳转，请耐心等侯.....

message.msgid: Device is upgrading,this may take about 2 minutes. Please wait...
message.msgstr: 设备正在升级，升级需持续两分钟左右，升级完成后页面会自动跳转，请耐心等侯
当前系统版本：%s; 发布日期%s
格式错误（升级文件太大）

message.msgid: An error occurred during policy upgrade (transmission error).
message.msgstr: 策略文件升级错误（传输错误）

message.msgid: Policy file is in wrong format!
Old-version policy file cannot be upgraded!
message.msgstr: 不能升级老版本的策略文件

message.msgid: Policy upgrade failed (An error occurred when writing flash).
message.msgstr: 策略文件升级失败（写flash错误）
原密码错误，请重新输入

message.msgid: This page allows you to configure the rebooting time, or click the 'Reboot' button to restart your device.
message.msgstr: 此页面用于AP重启,可单击重启AP按钮使设备立刻重启。

message.msgid: You need to reboot this device to save your configurations.
message.msgstr: 该设置需要重启路由器才能生效。

message.msgid: Here you can time the device to reboot.
message.msgstr: 本页设置路由器定时重启。

message.msgid: Pliease enter right Reboot time at
message.msgstr: 请填写正确的重启时间

message.msgid: Reboot Interval is range from 10 to 7200 minute
message.msgstr: 间隔时间必须在10-7200分钟范围之内

message.msgid: Please select the day(s) when you want your device to restart.

message.msgstr: 请输入正确的时间信息！

message.msgid: Please specify a correct limit for maximum clients.
message.msgstr: 请输入正确的客户端数阀值！

message.msgid: Please specify a correct limit for maximum download traffic.
message.msgstr: 请输入正确的下载流量阀值！

message.msgid: This page is used to set the device's system time. You can select either to set the time manually or get the GMT time from Internet and system will automatically connect to NTP server to synchronize the time.
message.msgstr: 本页设置AP的系统时间，您可以从互联网上获取标准的GMT时间。

message.msgid: Note: System time will be lost when the device is disconnected from power supply. However, it will be updated automatically when the device reconnects to Internet.
message.msgstr: 注意：关闭AP电源后，时间信息会丢失，当您下次开机连上Internet后，AP将会自动获取GMT时间。

message.msgid: (GMT-06:00) Mexico City, Guatemala, Costarica, Salvador, Nicaragua
message.msgstr: （GMT-06:00）墨西哥城,危地马拉,哥斯达黎加,萨尔瓦多,尼加拉瓜
（GMT-05:00）北美东部标准时,纽约,渥太华

message.msgid: (GMT+01:00) Denmark, Germany, Norway, Hungary, France, Belgium
message.msgstr: （GMT+01:00）中欧标准时,丹麦,德国,挪威,匈牙利,法国,比利时
（GMT+02:00）东欧标准时,以色列,埃及,布加勒斯特

message.msgid: (GMT+04:00) Sultanate of Oman, Mauritania, Reunion Island
(GMT+08:00) Beijing, Chongqing, Hong Kong, Urumuqi, Taipei
message.msgstr: （GMT+08:00）北京,重庆,乌鲁木齐,香港特别行政区,台北

message.msgid: (Note: GMT time will be updated automatically only when the device is connected to Internet)
message.msgstr: （注意：仅在连上互联网后才能获取GMT时间。）

message.msgid: Up to 4 entries can be configured!
Are you sure you want to delete this rule?
The number of logs must be between 100~300!
Port number must be between 1 and 65535!
The log server IP entered is used by gateway. Please retry!
message.msgstr: 添加的日志服务器IP地址与网关IP相同,请正确添加！
对不起，您已经配置了相同的日志服务器！

message.msgid: (To use the following rules, you must check this box.)
message.msgstr: 出现的规则，需选中该标志才能生效。

message.msgid: This section allows you to save current settings or restore previous settings.
message.msgstr: 这里您可以备份/恢复AP的当前设置。

message.msgid: Save Settings to Local Hard Drive
message.msgstr: 选择您要备份的文件目录

message.msgid: Load Settings from Local Hard Drive
message.msgstr: 选择您要导入的配置文件

message.msgid: Click this button to reset the device to factory default values.
message.msgstr: 单击此按钮将使AP的所有设置恢复到出厂时的默认状态。

message.msgid: Use this section to change your login user name and password.
message.msgstr: 本页修改系统管理员的用户名及密码。

message.msgid: Note: User name and password can only include 1～32 letters, numbers or underscore!
message.msgstr: 注意：用户名和密码只能由字母，数字，或下划线组成，长度为1～32个字符。

message.msgid: Input an IP(eg: 192.168.0.254) address or a domain name(eg: www.google.com):
message.msgstr: 请输入如下格式内容,如:ping 192.168.0.254
请输入正确时间，只能为正整数！

message.msgid: Device will restart automatically! The IP address will be reset to 192.168.0.254.
message.msgstr: 设备将自动重启！IP将更新为：192.168.0.254，

message.msgid: User Name and Password will be reset to admin. Update your PC's TCP/IP settings and re-access the utility if the webpage is not refreshed.
message.msgstr: 用户名和密码更新为：admin。如果页面没有刷新请更新您电脑的网络设置后重新登录！

message.msgid: %s Must be alphanumeric characters or underscore!
message.msgstr: %s 输入有误,只能输入字母,数字和下划线！

message.msgid: Invalid device name. %s can't be included.
System will be redirected to home page in 1 minute.
message.msgstr: 一分钟后系统会重新链接至首页。

message.msgid: New User Name and Administrator Name cannot be the same!
message.msgstr: 新用户名不能与管理员用户名相同！

message.msgid: New user name field should not be left blank!
New User Name must only include alphanumeric characters or underscore!
message.msgstr: 新用户名只能含有字母，数字或下划线！

message.msgid: New Password can only include letters, numbers or underscore!
message.msgstr: 新密码只能含有字母，数字或下划线！
新密码与确认新密码不一致，请重新输入！

message.msgid: Please first select a valid configuration file!
message.msgstr: 请首先选择导入的文件！

message.msgid: The file to import MUST have a file name suffix of cfg.
To activate loaded settings, you need to reboot the device.
Please select a path on your computer to save the configuration file.
message.msgstr: 导出配置参数,请指定保存参数的路径！

message.msgid: Please specify a valid timeout value between 1-60 minutes!
message.msgstr: 请输入有效超时时间,范围:1-60分钟！
请输入合法的年，应在1970～2037之间！

message.msgid: Are you sure you want to update your device?
Please enter a valid IP or domain name!
